bidirectional_hds_concept.hpp File Reference

Bidirectional HDS concept definition. More...

Go to the source code of this file.

Detailed Description

Bidirectional HDS concept definition.

Definition
This concept refines the ForwardHDSConcept and BackwardHDSConcept, and specifies additional bidirectional traversal category. Bidirectional category requires both the forward_category and the backward_category defined to iterate over the HDS data structure, which means both clockwise & counter clockwise movement around the facet and vertex. From these two categories all others can be accessed with the help of the opposite of a halfedge.
Refinement of
  • ForwardHDSConcept
  • BackwardHDSConcept
Notation
  • HDS A type that is a model of BidirectionalHDSConcept
  • hds A non-modifiable instance of HDS
  • h,g Halfedge descriptors, of type X::halfedge_descriptor
Associated types
  • hds_traits<HDS>::halfedge_descriptor: must be DefaultConstructible and CopyConstructible, EqualityComparable, Assignable.
  • hds_traits<HDS>::traversal_category: must be convertible to hds_traits<HDS>::bidirectional_traversal_tag.
Definitions
  • halfedge descriptor is a type that contains information to access the halfedge.
  • traversal category is a type that contains information about the direction of the traversal, which is forward, backward or bidirectional. For bidirectional hds concept, it has to be convertible to hds_traits<HDS>::bidirectional_traversal_tag.
Valid Expressions
  • see ForwardHDSConcept and BackwardHDSConcept.
Expression Semantics
  • see ForwardHDSConcept and BackwardHDSConcept.
Complexity guarantees
  • see ForwardHDSConcept and BackwardHDSConcept.
Invariants
The invariants for ForwardHDSConcept, and BackwardHDSConcept should hold for BidirectionalHDSConcept also.
Concept-checking class
 template <class HDS> 
 struct BidirectionalHDSConcept {
   typedef typename hds_traits<HDS>::halfedge_descriptor halfedge_descriptor; 
   typedef typename hds_traits<HDS>::traversal_category traversal_category;
    void constraints() {
       using namespace boost;
       function_requires<ForwardHDSConcept<HDS> >();
       function_requires<BackwardHDSConcept<HDS> >();
       function_requires<ConvertibleConcept<traversal_category,
                                          bidirectional_traversal_tag> >();  
    }
    BidirectionalHDS hds;
 };
